contextId.information: The prophet is speaking to the land of Lebanon as if it were a person. AT: "People of Lebanon, get ready for fire to burn up your cedar trees" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_apostrophe]])
contextId.quote: Open your doors, Lebanon, that fire may devour your cedars

contextId.information: AT: "You, sword! You must wake up." This is a command from Yahweh for his shepherd to be attacked and killed. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_apostrophe]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
